mapper.sql: id, username, password, telephone, address, role, creator, editor, create_time, edit_time, is_deleted
mapper.insert: insert into user (username, password, telephone, address, role, creator, editor, create_time, edit_time) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now())

insert into user
id,
username,
password,
telephone,
address,
role,
creator,
editor,
create_time,
edit_time,
is_deleted,

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
editor = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editor = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(1) from user where username = #{username}
